translation: Brahman is the oblation; Brahman is the melted butter (ghee); by Brahman is the oblation poured into the fire of Brahman; Brahman indeed shall be attained by one who always sees Brahman in action.
commentary: 4.24 Brahma Brahman? offering the oblation? Brahma Brahman? Havih the clarified butter? Brahmagnau in the fire of Brahman? Brahmana by Brahman? Hutam is offered? Brahma Brahman? Eve only? Then by him? shall the destination be reached? Brahmakarmasamadhina by the man who is absorbed in action which is Brahman.Commentary This is JnanaYajna or wisdomsacrifice wherein the idea of Brahman is substituted for the ideas
